name: Meaningless World
effects: Increase ATK by 150% for 3 turns when HP drops below 5% (max 9000x)
Increase DEF by 150% for 3 turns when HP drops below 5% (max 9000x)
Increase MAG by 150% for 3 turns when HP drops below 5% (max 9000x)
Increase SPR by 150% for 3 turns when HP drops below 5% (max 9000x)

name: Meaningless World
沒有意義的世界
무의미한 세계
Monde insensé
Sinnlose Welt
Mundo sin sentido
desc_short: Boost ATK, DEF, MAG, and SPR when HP is below a certain point
HP低於一定量時提高攻擊魔力防禦精神的數值
HP가 일정량 이하일 때 공격력, 방어력, 마력, 정신력 상승
Augmente l'ATT, la DEF, la MAGIE et la PSY lorsque les PV sont en dessous d'un certain seuil
ANG, ABW, MAG und PSY hoch bei geringen LP.
Aumenta ATQ, DEF, MAG y ESP cuando la VIT está baja
desc_long: Boosts ATK, DEF, MAG, and SPR when HP is below a certain point.
HP低於一定量時提高攻擊魔力防禦精神的數值。
HP가 일정량 이하일 때 공격력, 방어력, 마력, 정신력이 상승합니다.
Augmente l'ATT, la DEF, la MAGIE et la PSY lorsque les PV sont en dessous d'un certain seuil
ANG, ABW, MAG und PSY hoch bei geringen LP.
Aumenta el ATQ, la DEF, la MAG y el ESP cuando la VIT está baja.
